author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Ambassador of the Federal Republic of Germany to India Martin Ney on Friday called on Prince of Arcot Nawab Mohammed Abdul Ali at his ancestral home, Amir Mahal.

Dr. Ney was accompanied by his wife and Consul General of Germany, Achim Fabig. A release from Amir Mahal described the visit as a courtesy call.

Reception hosted

The Ambassador expressed his happiness in visiting the historic Amir Mahal, and admired the continued services of the Prince, in the promotion of secularism and harmony among people who belong to various faiths.

The Prince hosted a reception in honour of the visiting dignitaries.
title: German envoy meets Prince of Arcot
